snippet: Why was so much chatter devoted to Rex Ryan and the Jets in a week when the Giants were preparing for the playoffs? The circus was in town.
abstract: Why was so much chatter devoted to Rex Ryan and the Jets in a week when the Giants were preparing for the playoffs? The circus was in town.
lead_paragraph: Why was so much chatter devoted to Rex Ryan and the Jets in these parts during a week when the Giants were preparing for the playoffs? Josh Levin put it well at Slate:

headline.main: The Onion Spoofs Ryan and Sanchez
